nodes.description: Sindh Caretaker Chief Minister Fazal-ur-Rehman在周五谴责爆炸事件，表达对生命损失和受伤者的哀悼及祈祷
nodes.support_text: strongly condemned blasts in Bannu and Mastung. He expressed his grief over the loss of precious lives and prayed for the early recovery of injured.

edges.support_text: strongly condemned blasts in Bannu and Mastung
